name: Wall of Names
description:
Life is short. What mark will you leave on the world?

This is a online multiplayer game/social experiment where you can write/draw anything you want on a big wall. What will you write? Your name? A story? A haiku? You decide (But stay SFW please and delete anything naughty).

This game was submitted to the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2.

Controls

  • Move with ARROW KEYS
  • Pick color with F1-F8
  • Write/draw with OTHER KEYS

Press SPACE to get past instructions screen.

Credits

Music:

  • Urbania by Dan Knoflicek
  • Gang$tazz by Alexandr Zhelanov
